801.name: Stoppage of game/Time out
801.description: The fingertips held perpendicluar to the palm of the hand

802.name: Face-off
802.description: The forearms held horizontally, the palms of the hands downwards

803.name: Hit-in
803.description: The arm held horizontally in the advantage direction, the palm of the hand downwards

804.name: Free-hit
804.description: The arm held horizontally in the advantage direction, the palm of the hand downwards

805.name: Advantage
805.description: The arm held in the advantage direction, the palm of the hand upwards

806.name: Penalty shot
806.description: The arms held above the head and crossed at the wrist, with the fists closed

807.name: Delayed penalty/Delayed penalty shot
807.description: The arm held vertically, the palm of the hand forwards

808.name: Bench penalty/Personal penalty
808.description: The arm held vertically, minor penalty shown with two fingers and major penalty with five, 10 minutes with a clenched hand.

809.name: Match penalty
809.description: The arm held vertically with the red card displayed

810.name: Goal
810.description: The arm in the direction of first the goal and then the centre spot

901.name: Hit
901.description: One arm held horizontally in the advantage direction with the palm facing down, with the other arm making a single blow with the hand to the extended forearm

902.name: Locking an opponent’s stick One arm held horizontally in
902.description: the advantage direction with the palm facing down, with the other arm pushing the extended forearm in a single downwards motion

903.name: Lifting an opponent’s stick
903.description: One arm held horizontally in the advantage direction with the palm facing down, with the other arm pushing the extended forearm in a single upwards motion

904.name: High stick
904.description: Imitating the holding of a stick

905.name: Placing stick, foot or leg between an opponent’s leg
905.description: One leg slightly raised and one arm indicating a movement beneath the uplifted leg

906.name: Hooking
906.description: The forearms held horizontally, imitating the holding of a stick and the motion of pulling the stick

907.name: Incorrect pushing
907.description: Can also be performed with only one hand

908.name: Backing into an opponent
908.description: The hands cupped, the palms of the hands upwards, the forearms pulled backwards

909.name: Roughing
909.description: The hands met in two fists at chest level with the back of the hands facing upwards

910.name: Holding
910.description: One arm held horizontally in the advantage direction with the palm facing down, with the other arm gripping the wrist of the extended arm

911.name: Interference
911.description: Both arms crossed in front of the chest with palms facing the body

912.name: Incorrect kick
912.description: The foot turned outward, on a level with the ankle and with a kicking motion

913.name: High kick
913.description: The foot turned outward, on a level with the knee

914.name: Entering the goalkeeper area
914.description: Both arms extended above the head with fingertips meeting to create a triangle shape

915.name: Incorrect distance
915.description: The forearms held vertically at shoulder width apart

916.name: Incorrect jump
916.description: The palms of the hands held out facing upwards with an upwards action

917.name: Incorrect throw-out
917.description: The forearms held horizontally, the palms of the hands facing each other

918.name: Incorret hit-in/Incorrect free-hit
918.description: The palm of the hand upwards, in the direction of the original free-hit, then moved as shown

919.name: Playing the ball lying down
919.description: The palm of the hand downwards with a left and right motion

920.name: Hands
920.description: The palm of the hand facing forward

921.name: Header
921.description: The palm of the hand to the forehead

922.name: Incorrect substitution
922.description: The forearms rotating in a rolling action

923.name: Repeated offences
923.description: One arm held horizontally in the advantage direction with the palm facing down, with the other arm making three blows with the hand to the extended forearm

924.name: Delaying play
924.description: One arm extended above the head with a single finger pointing upwards and the lower arm moving in a circular motion
